name: adbm-rethinkdb
description: RethinkDB adapter for adbm database migration tool

scripts.docker:db: docker start adbm_rethinkdb_dev_db || docker run --name adbm_rethinkdb_dev_db -p 28015:28015 -p 8080:8080 -d rethinkdb:2.3
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test

author: Michael Smesnik <ms@tailored-apps.com>
